name: Blocky Jumper
description:
A short first-person 'puzzle'-platformer where you have to go through levels with your unique 'block gun' that can create blocks and barriers to help you out.

Made in 30(ish) non-consecutive hours as a self-challenge.

Assets used:

  • Space Walk (Music) by Arthur - https://opengameart.org/content/space-walk
  • PewPews by dklon - https://opengameart.org/content/pewpews
  • Pain sound effects by EmoPreben - https://opengameart.org/content/pain-sounds-by-emopreben
  • Starfield Skybox by PULSAR BYTES - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...
  • 48 Particle Effects Pack by GAPH - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/spells/48-particle-effect-pa...
  • Free Sci-Fi textures by Luca Eberhart - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-sci-fi-textures-9933

Let me know if I forgot anything!
